{"id":347417529,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 10 months","timestamp":1590984772,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/347417529/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sqrt(x)","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int mySqrt(int x) {\n        int R = x/2 + 1; \n        int L = 0; \n        int ans = -1; \n        while(L <= R) {\n            int mid = L + (R - L)/2; \n            \n            if ((unsigned long long int)mid * mid > x) {\n                R = mid - 1; \n            } else if (mid * mid < x) {\n                L = mid + 1; \n                ans = mid; \n            } else {\n                return mid; \n            }\n        }\n        return ans; \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sqrtx"}
